Title: Frequently asked questions

FAQs.Question: How often should I have my patio/deck/siding pressure washed?
FAQs.Answer: The frequency of pressure washing depends on several factors such as the local climate and the material of your patio/deck/siding. We recommend consulting with our professionals for the best advice.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to be home during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: While it's not necessary for you to be home, we ensure that our owner is present at every job to provide excellent customer service.

FAQs.Question: How long does it take to pressure wash an average-sized home?
FAQs.Answer: The duration of the pressure washing service can vary based on the size and condition of your home. However, we pride ourselves on our efficiency and aim to complete jobs as quickly as possible without compromising on quality.

FAQs.Question: Do I need to remove all outdoor items, such as furniture, before the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we recommend removing or covering all outdoor items to protect them from the pressure washing process.

FAQs.Question: Can pressure washing damage my property's surface?
FAQs.Answer: If not done correctly, pressure washing can potentially damage your property's surface. However, our team of professionals is trained to use the right techniques and pressures to avoid any damage.

FAQs.Question: What cleaning agents do you use during the pressure washing service?
FAQs.Answer: We use a variety of cleaning agents depending on the type of surface and the level of dirt and grime. All our cleaning agents are safe and effective.

FAQs.Question: Are you licensed and insured to provide pressure washing services?
FAQs.Answer: Yes, we are certified by the Better Business Bureau and fully insured to provide pressure washing services.

FAQs.Question: Do you provide any guarantees for your work?
FAQs.Answer: Absolutely! We guarantee your satisfaction at a reasonable and comfortable cost.
